author: Staff Reporter
text:
A workshop for empowering MSMEs through e-Commerce and Online Marketing held here recently.

Organised by Tamil Nadu Small and Tiny Industries Association FNF Service Centre (TFSC), a collaborative venture of TANSTIA and Friedrich Naumann Stiftung fur die Freiheit (FNF) Germany and Salem District Small Scale and Tiny Industries Association (SADISSTIA), the two-day workshop is to provide supporting services for MSMEs in the areas of e-Commerce and online marketing.

Vijayalakshmi, director of TFSC explained the objective of the workshop while Suboth Kumar Agarwal, programme director of TFSC for South Asian Countries, detailed about the importance of e-Commerce and online marketing. K. Mariappan, vice-president, TANSTIA, Coimbatore Region, said that by adopting online marketing, product promotion could be maximised in the global market.

Rishab Chandra, resource person from New Delhi, spoke.
title: Workshop on empowering MSMEs
